resources.string: 1. What is the derivative of f where f(x) = cos(x)?
2. What is the area bounded by functions f(x) = e^x, g(x) = x^2 and by curves x = 2, x = 5?
3. Check all functions differentiable in x = 0.
4. Which statement is true? Check all that applies.
5. What is the limit of sequence a_n = n*sin(2/n) when n goes to infinity?
6. Check all functions continuous in x = 0.
7. Which statement is true? Check all that applies.
8. What is the limit of function f(x) = ln(x) when x goes to zero from right side?
9. Which equasion is true? Check all that applies.
10. Which number series is convergent? Check all that applies.
